Dialogue: You would betray me? You fool! You TRAITOR!
You would pity these souls? They are weak, misearable, and already lifeless! I would devour them and birth a new world!
They are manipulating you, do you not see this? They do not want us to be together! Please, Monad, join me and give me the strength I need!
MONAD! THAT IS ENOUGH! I will devour you and everyone else to make my new world! This is your purpose. It has always been your purpose!
LET ME DEVOUR YOU! I WILL DEVOUR EVERYTHING! I AM A GOD! I WILL BE THE GOD OF THE NEW WORLD!
